document_data.name: Tawar Kroul
document_data.mainbody: '''Tawar Kroul''' was the main representative of surface-dwellers in [[Mantol-Derith]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Tawar usually sold alcohol in exchange for art objects, poisons, and [[obsidian]] daggers.
document_data.Personality: Tawar had small degree of [[orc]] blood: her grandfather was a [[half-orc]] who mated with a [[human]]. She acted very aggressively.
